SELECT tfa.loginID, tfa.fair_no AS id, tfa.fair_title AS title, ifnull(tfa.fair_startdate, '-') AS startDate, ifnull(tfa.fair_enddate, '-') AS endDate, ifnull(tdc.detail_name, '-') AS location, ifnull(tdc.detail_code, '-') AS locationCd, ifnull(tfa.fair_name, '-') AS name, ifnull(tfa.is_delete, '-') AS isDelete, ifnull(ui.user_phone, '-') AS phone, EXISTS(select 1 from tb_fair_join where fair_no = id group by loginID having loginID = #{loginId}) AS joined FROM tb_fair tfa JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON tfa.loginID = ui.loginID JOIN tb_detail_code tdc ON tdc.group_code = 'location' AND tfa.fair_location = tdc.detail_code WHERE tfa.is_delete = 2
and fair_title Like CONCAT('%', #{srctitle}, '%')
and fair_location Like CONCAT('%', #{region}, '%')
order by fair_no desc limit #{pageindex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT count(1) AS tot_cnt FROM tb_fair WHERE is_delete = 2 and fair_title Like CONCAT('%', #{srctitle}, '%')
and fair_location Like CONCAT('%', #{region}, '%')

SELECT tfa.loginID, tfa.fair_no AS id, tfa.fair_title AS title, ifnull(tfa.fair_content, '-') AS content, ifnull(tfa.fair_startdate, '-') AS startDate, ifnull(tfa.fair_enddate, '-') AS endDate, ifnull(tfa.fair_address1, '-') AS address1, ifnull(tfa.fair_address2, '-') AS address2, ifnull(tfa.fair_zipcode, '-') AS zipcode, ifnull(tfa.fair_name, '-') AS name, ifnull(ui.user_phone, '-') AS phone, ifnull(ui.user_email, '-') AS email, ifnull(tfa.fair_companyNum, '-') AS companyNum, ifnull(tfa.fair_companyNum, '-') AS companyNumCd, tfa.file_cd AS fileCd, tfi.file_name, tfi.file_size, tfi.file_nadd, tfi.file_madd FROM tb_fair tfa LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON tfa.loginID = ui.loginID LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file tfi ON tfa.file_cd = tfi.file_cd WHERE tfa.fair_no = #{id};

SELECT detail_code AS locationCd, detail_name AS location
FROM tb_detail_code WHERE group_code = "location";
